Key Match Events: The Phillies rallied past the Rays with a 9-4 win.
Edwin Uceta hit Nick Castellanos with a pitch, leading to a benches-clearing incident.
Post-Match Reflections: Bryce Harper expressed his frustration over the benches-clearing incident.
The Phillies can taste their first division title in 13 years, with a magic number of 10.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kyle Schwarber exited the game with a hyperextended elbow.
Brandon Marsh and Bench coach Mike Calitri held back Bryce Harper during the incident.
Others: The Phillies are playing with a depleted roster due to injuries.
Edwin Uceta's pitch to Nick Castellanos was the fastest he has thrown all season.
